title: Comprehensive GDP Analysis
original_question: A country's economy in 2023: Consumption = $5000, Investment = $2000, Government Purchases = $1500, Exports = $800, Imports = $1000. Additionally, intermediate goods production was $3000, and used car sales totaled $500. Calculate GDP using the expenditure approach and explain why intermediate goods and used car sales are excluded.

segments.text: Consumption = $5000, Investment = $2000, Government Purchases = $1500, Exports = $800, Imports = $1000.
segments.highlight_text: Consumption = $5000, Investment = $2000, Government Purchases = $1500, Exports = $800, Imports = $1000
segments.explanation: 支出法 GDP 的各个组成部分。
中间产品不计入 GDP，避免重复计算。
二手车交易不计入 GDP，因为不是新生产的产品。

segments.text: Calculate GDP using the expenditure approach and explain why intermediate goods and used car sales are excluded.

traps.title: GDP Exclusions
traps.description: GDP 不包括：中间产品（避免重复计算）、二手交易（不是新生产）。

solution.source_label: 来自已知条件：各支出组成部分

solution.content: 中间产品（$3000$）不计入 GDP，因为它们的价值已经包含在最终产品的价格中，计入会导致重复计算。
solution.source_label: 外部核心知识：避免重复计算原则

solution.content: 二手车交易（$500$）不计入 GDP，因为 GDP 只计算新生产的产品和服务，二手车是已有资产的转移，不涉及新生产。
solution.source_label: 外部核心知识：GDP 只计算新生产
